splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Menya wabici ĩrĩa ĩrĩ hakuhĩ nawe ya IEBC
splash.disclaimer: Wĩtĩkĩrie ũkinyanĩria wa kũndũ gũcaria wabici ya IEBC kĩrĩa kĩrĩ hakuhĩ na ũhote gũkinya kuo na ihenya.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Hingũra gĩkari gĩaku gĩtheru na ũhihinye rĩngĩ

search.placeholder: Thuthuria wabici cia IEBC kũringana na county, gĩcigo kĩa gĩthurano, kana kũrĩa ciikaraga...
search.noMatchQuery: Gũtirĩ wabici ĩngĩigana ya "{{query}}". Geria njĩra ĩngĩ ya gũcaria.
search.noOfficesInArea: Gũtirĩ wabici ya IEBC yonekire gĩcigo-inĩ kĩanyu.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Hũthĩra njĩra ya gũkinya kũrĩa ũikaraga nĩguo ũhote kuona thogora wa ngari, ũheo njĩra cia kũrĩa ũikaraga, na wone njĩra ĩrĩa ĩrĩ hakuhĩ ya gũthiĩ wabici-inĩ ĩno.
bottomSheet.trafficSurcharge: Ngarama ya Makĩria nĩ ũndũ wa Njira ĩiyũrĩte Ngari
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Community can confirm if this office is real
bottomSheet.within500m: You must be within 500m of the office
bottomSheet.locationNotStored: Your exact location is not stored
bottomSheet.distanceAway: You're {{distance}}m away. Please move within {{maxDistance}}m of the office to confirm.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Failed to submit confirmation. Please try again.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Location permission is required to confirm. Please enable location access and try again.

layers.iebcOfficesDesc: All IEBC office locations across Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Parliamentary and electoral boundaries across Kenya as defined by IEBC. Each polygon represents one constituency with its corresponding code and name.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Distribution of healthcare facilities across the country (large dataset — may take a few extra moments to load)
layers.countiesDesc: Distribution of county borders across the country
layers.myLocationDesc: Show your current location on the map
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Toggle layers on and off to customize your map view. You can combine multiple data layers with different base maps for the best experience.

contribute.title: Contribute Missing Office Location
contribute.description: Help us map all IEBC offices across Kenya by contributing accurate location data.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Paste Google Maps link or coordinates
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Photo of the office, signage, or surrounding area helps verification
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Drag & drop or click to upload
contribute.movePin: Drag the pin to adjust the exact location
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Your contribution has been submitted and will be reviewed by moderators.
contribute.submissionNote: Note: Community verification helps improve accuracy. Thank you for contributing!
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Invalid coordinates. Please check latitude and longitude values.
contribute.errorSubmissionFailed: Failed to submit contribution. Please try again.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Location permission denied. Please enable location access.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Failed to get location. Please try manually entering coordinates.
contribute.parseError: Invalid format. Please paste a valid Google Maps link or coordinates.
